content: To build out our talent, we have added several highly experienced executives, including Alex Kim, as Chief Operating Officer; Jeremy Davis, as Chief Commercial Officer; Mona Abou-Sayed, as Senior Vice President of SBS; Anders Davas, as Senior Vice President of Global Operations; and more recently Matt Ritchie as Vice President, Global Sales Operations; Seiya Ohta as Vice President, Customer & User Experience; as well as David Panzarella, as Vice President, Commercial Operations, Americas; and finally, Kathy Harrell as Vice President and Controller.
